title: Looking for adc or support duo
body:
I'm in bronze 4 currently still doing my flex queue, looking for either a adc or support main.
I main these champions for both the roles which are not in any order, i use skype, ts3 and curse add me in game if your interested
Sup: Thresh, Blitz, Leona, Sona, Braum
Adc: Lucian, Kalista, Vayne, Ezreal

replies.body: im a support main if you want to duo?
